```{r prop w attr}
# see igraph function in manuscript.rmd
extract_attr_props <- function(tree_name){
  atts <- str_split(tree_name$attributesAll, ",")
  tree.i <- as.igraph.Node(tree_name, vertexAttributes = tree_name$attributesAll, directed=TRUE)
  size <- length(V(tree.i))
  
  num_w_att <- rep(0, length(atts))
  for(i in 1:length(atts)){
    has_att <- 0
    attr <- atts[[i]]
    for(j in 1:size){
      val <- vertex_attr(tree.i, attr, V(tree.i)[j])
      if(! is.na(val)){
        has_att <- has_att + 1
      }
    }
    num_w_att[[i]] <- has_att/size
  }
  return(num_w_att)
}

```

```{r}
# function to extract stats from tree object, 
# takeoff stats only really relevant for our analysis on larger trees, so limiting that within this function to avoid dispersion parameter error
extract_tree_info <- function(tree_name){
  attributes <- paste(tree_name$attributesAll, collapse = ", ")
  tree.i <- as.igraph.Node(tree_name, vertexAttributes = tree_name$attributesAll, directed=TRUE)
  zero_name <- names(which(degree(tree.i, mode = c("in")) == 0)) #root node
  # calculate R0 (three ways)
  d <- degree(tree.i, mode ="out") #all degrees
  tree.r0 <- round(mean(d), digits = 2)
  d_noterm <- d[d>0]
  tree.r0.noterm <- round(mean(d_noterm), digits = 2)
  # then want to exclude vertices who are in gen = max_gen(tree.i)
  # determine max distance to all vertices of tree from root (zero_name), max_gen function already does this
  gens=max(distances(tree.i, v = zero_name, to = V(tree.i), mode = c("out")))
  not_last_gen <- V(tree.i)[which(distances(tree.i, v = zero_name, to = V(tree.i), mode = c("out")) < gens)]
  d_nolastterm <- degree(tree.i, not_last_gen, mode = "out")
  tree.r0.nolastterm <- round(mean(d_nolastterm), digits = 2)
  
  # calculate coefficient of variance, tree size
  tree.cv <- round(mean(degree(tree.i, mode = "out"))/var(degree(tree.i, mode = "out")), digits = 2)
  tree.sz <- vcount(tree.i)
  
  # calculate dispersion parameter, if unable to optimize, assign NA
  tree.dp <- tryCatch({round((fitdistr(d, "negative binomial"))$estimate["size"], digits = 2)
            }, error=function(e) {NA})
  tree.dp.noterm <- tryCatch({round((fitdistr(d_noterm, "negative binomial"))$estimate["size"], digits = 2)
            }, error=function(e) {NA})
  tree.dp.nolastterm <- tryCatch({round((fitdistr(d_nolastterm, "negative binomial"))$estimate["size"], 
                                        digits = 2)
            }, error=function(e) {NA})
  
  # calculate r0 and dp for generations 0 and 1 for trees with 20+ nodes and 2+ generations of spread
  gen1 <- as.integer(degree(tree.i, zero_name, mode = c("out"))) # number in first generation, degree of zero_name
  prop_gen1 <- gen1/tree.sz
  r0.takeoff <- r0.takeoff.noterm <- dp.takeoff <- dp.takeoff.noterm <- NA # initializing
  if(max_gen(tree_name) >= 2 & tree.sz >= 20){
    first_gen_degs <- degree(tree.i, V(tree.i)[which(distances(tree.i, v = zero_name, to = V(tree.i), 
                                                               mode = c("out")) == 1)], mode = c("out"))
    first_gen_degs_nt <- first_gen_degs[first_gen_degs > 0]
    r0.takeoff <- sum(gen1, sum(first_gen_degs))/(gen1 + 1) # gen1 is degree of zero_name
    r0.takeoff.noterm <- sum(gen1, sum(first_gen_degs_nt))/(length(first_gen_degs_nt) + 1)
    #r0.takeoff.nolastterm <- r0.takeoff # these are equivalent b/c last gen terminal nodes must be in G2+
    
    degrees <- c(gen1, first_gen_degs) # b/c gen1 is zero_name degree
    degrees_nt <- c(gen1, first_gen_degs_nt)
    dp.takeoff <- tryCatch({round((fitdistr(degrees, "negative binomial"))$estimate["size"], digits = 2)},
                           error = function(e) {NA})
    dp.takeoff.noterm <- tryCatch({round((fitdistr(degrees_nt, "negative binomial"))$estimate["size"], 
                                         digits = 2)},
                           error = function(e) {NA})
    #dp.takeoff.nolastterm <- dp.takeoff
  }
  thresh <- qpois(0.99, tree.r0) #threshold num 2nd infs to be a SS, Lloyd-Smith et al. (2005)
  thresh_noterm <- qpois(0.99, tree.r0.noterm)
  thresh_nolastterm <- qpois(0.99, tree.r0.nolastterm)
  thresh_g01 <- qpois(0.99, r0.takeoff)
  thresh_g01_noterm <- qpois(0.99, r0.takeoff.noterm)
  num.ss <- length(which(degree(tree.i, mode = c("out")) > thresh))
  num.ss.noterm <- length(which(degree(tree.i, mode = c("out")) > thresh_noterm))
  num.ss.nolastterm <- length(which(degree(tree.i, mode = c("out")) > thresh_nolastterm))
  num.ss.g01 <- length(which(degree(tree.i, mode = c("out")) > thresh_g01))
  num.ss.g01.noterm <- length(which(degree(tree.i, mode = c("out")) > thresh_g01_noterm))
  prop.ss <- num.ss/tree.sz # not adjusting for terminals with this stat yet
  
  return(list("R0" = tree.r0, "R0 NoTerm" = tree.r0.noterm, "R0 NoLastTerm" = tree.r0.nolastterm,
              "DP" = tree.dp, "DP NoTerm" = tree.dp.noterm, "DP NoLastTerm" = tree.dp.nolastterm,
              "R0 G01" = r0.takeoff, "R0 G01 NoTerm" = r0.takeoff.noterm,
              "DP G01" = dp.takeoff, "DP G01 NoTerm" = dp.takeoff.noterm,
              "Size" = tree.sz, "Generations" = gens, 
              "Thresh" = thresh, "Thresh NoTerm" = thresh_noterm, "Thresh NoLastTerm" = thresh_nolastterm,
              "Thresh G01" = thresh_g01, "Thresh G01 NoTerm" = thresh_g01_noterm,
              "Num SS" = num.ss, "Num SS NoTerm" = num.ss.noterm, "Num SS NoLastTerm" = num.ss.nolastterm,
              "Num SS G01" = num.ss.g01, "Num SS G01 NoTerm" = num.ss.g01.noterm,
              "Prop SS" = prop.ss, "Gen1 Size" = gen1, "Prop Gen1" = prop_gen1, "Attributes" = attributes))
}
```

tree_list=readRDS("data/database_trees.RDS")

# dataframe of disease types and transmission modes

                                "nrv", "rub", "covid", "tb", "cpx",

                        Dis=sub('\\..*', '', substring(names(tree_list), 10))) %>% 
             full_join(disMode)

# merge with disease data

# clean up attributes
treeData$Attributes <- ifelse(treeData$Attributes=="attr", NA, treeData$Attributes)
treeData$Attributes <- ifelse(treeData$Attributes=="sex, age, cont, attr" , "sex, age, cont", treeData$Attributes)

# attribute dataframe
attDat <- cbind(unique(sort(trimws(unlist(lapply(treeData$Attributes, 
                                                 function(x){unlist(strsplit(x, ","))}))))),
                c("age", "context","department","duration_exposure","hospitalization","serial_interval",
                  "location","occupation","symptom_onset","quarantine_status","relationship","sequence","sex",
                  "status","strain","survival", "symptom","trans"))



attribute_clean <- function(att_string){
  x <- trimws(unlist(strsplit(att_string, ",")))
  y <- which(attDat[,1]%in%x)
  z <- unname(attDat[y,2])
  return(paste0(z, collapse = ", "))
}

treeData$Attributes<- unname(sapply(treeData$Attributes, attribute_clean))
